sentence.text: Dovaston says that the computer contains some of the most sickening and horrific details imaginable .
The impact was sickening and loud .
And Spurs coach Doug Livermore added : ` It is sickening to think we had done enough and then had to leave with nothing .
The gaping hole in the 10-storey building still bleeds smoke and the stench of burnt fuel oil is sickening .
There was a sickening crunch , and he lost sight of her ill the swell .
Predators , we have seen , learn not to eat monarchs because they are sickening .
Where Morpurgo 's left eye should have been was only a sickening fold of flesh .
It is sickening that the Government would never dare to treat taxpayers in that way over their entitlements to past reliefs or past allowances .
Is nowhere in Britain safe from this sort of sickening attack ? "
I have the highest praise for the professionalism and dedication of the Oxford police and for the bravery that they have shown when confronted by ugly and sickening attacks .
The woman at the change counter was awoken from her daydream by a sickening crunch .
Its benevolently smiling head fell off and bounced with a sickening crunch from the beam projector into another of the statues , knocking it off the deck of the float and into the canal .
A great shudder went through the old house , as with a sickening crunch the weight hit her front wall .

A woman of about 30 lurched out of the Post Office in front of us and staggered down the road a few steps before falling -- her exposed thighs and palms making a sickening ` slap-smack " sound on the pavement .
And then suddenly it was all over as Damien 's body smashed with a sickening thud into the solid frame of the fence .
The nozzle is still four or five inches short of target when the spider vanishes with a quick shushhh and a sickening thud from the body of the cleaner .
Farrell pushed the agent 's head back sharply , banging it against the wall with a sickening thud .
Her heart took up a sickening thud .
The full , torrid , sickening truth behind the astonishing saga that will rock the country to its very foundations , can now be revealed .
I get a sickening feeling in my stomach .
He carried on ripping and tearing at his legs relentlessly and with sickening ferocity , even drawing blood at times .
The front-page of the Sun confidently stressed that The Fox ` based his sickening crimes on hard-core videos hired from sex shops " .
Then , eerily , the sickening stench turns to something more tolerable , the familiar aroma of barbecuing meat .
There were so many little tasks that she would have to master , she realized with a sickening lurch of uncertainty .
Her train of thought halted with a sickening jolt as she remembered that this summer there would n't be many evenings like that .
LIVERPOOL MP David Alton is spearheading a campaign urging action over a sickening report on child abuse .
The Chelsea defender suffered serious ligament damage in his right knee after a sickening first half clash with Liverpool 's Aston Villa-bound striker .
She had a sickening and involuntary vision of him and the bed sliding out into the blackness .
